name: Reactive Scene
description: Inspired by Scene & Sequel and the Snowflake Method

attributes.name: Reaction
attributes.description: How does the character respond to the setback in the previous scene?

attributes.name: Dilemma
attributes.description: What choices does the character have to respond to their setback? Where will each choice lead?

attributes.name: Decision
attributes.description: What does the character decide to do in response to their setback?
